IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDescription: CHAMINADE UNIVERSITY OFFERS ITS STUDENTS AN EDUCATION IN A COLLABORATIVE LEARNING ENVIRONMENT.
IRS990.MissionDescription: CHAMINADE UNIVERSITY OFFERS ITS STUDENTS AN EDUCATION IN A COLLABORATIVE LEARNING ENVIRONMENT THAT PREPARES THEM FOR LIFE, WORK AND SERVICE. GUIDED BY ITS CATHOLIC, MARIANIST AND LIBERAL ARTS EDUCATIONAL TRADITIONS, CHAMINADE ENCOURAGES THE DEVELOPMENT OF MORAL CHARACTER AND PERSONAL COMPETENCIES, AND THE COMMITMENT TO BUILD A JUST AND PEACEFUL SOCIETY. THE UNIVERSITY OFFERS THE CIVIC AND CHURCH COMMUNITIES OF THE PACIFIC REGION ITS ACADEMIC AND INTELLECTUAL RESOURCES IN THE PURSUIT OF COMMON AIMS.
IRS990.Description: CHAMINADE OFFERS AN EDUCATION IN A COLLABORATIVE LEARNING ENVIRONMENT THAT PREPARES STUDENTS FOR LIFE, SERVICE AND SUCCESSFUL CAREERS. GUIDED BY ITS CATHOLIC, MARIANIST AND LIBERAL ARTS EDUCATIONAL TRADITIONS AND ACCREDITED BY THE WESTERN ASSOCIATION OF COLLEGES AND UNIVERSITIES, CHAMINADE PROVIDES 2800 STUDENTS WITH 23 UNDERGRADUATE DEGREE PROGRAMS, 5 GRADUATE DEGREE PROGRAMS AND SEVERAL DEGREE OPPORTUNITIES FOR WORKING ADULTS IN THE ACCELERATED ADULT EVENING PROGRAMS.

Activity2.Description: AUXILIARY ENTERPRISES AT CHAMINADE INCLUDE A 400 STUDENT RESIDENCE HALL PROGRAM; DINING SERVICES FEATURING THE SILVERSWORD CAFE AND COURTYARD PATIO; NCAA PACIFIC WEST CONFERENCE DIVISION II ATHLETIC PROGRAM ANNUALLY HOSTING THE EA SPORTS MAUI INVITATIONAL BASKETBALL TOURNAMENT; CAMPUS BOOKSTORE; COPY CENTER AND MAIL SERVICES.

Form990PartVIISectionA.Title: DEAN OF NATURAL SCIENCES AND MATHEMATICS

OtherLiabilities.Description: UNSECURED NOTES PAYABLE TO MARIANIST CENTER OF HAWAII

Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.Explanation: IN THE CURRENT YEAR, THE ORGANIZATION PURCHASED A FINE ART EDITION OF THE ST. JOHN'S BIBLE. THE BIBLE IS A WORK OF ART AND A WORK OF THEOLOGY. THE VISION AND VALUES OF THE BIBLE ARE TO IGNITE IMAGINATION, GLORIFY GOD'S WORD, REVIVE TRADITION, DISCOVER HISTORY, FOSTER THE ARTS, AND GIVE VOICE. THE ST. JOHN'S BIBLE, ON PUBLIC EXHIBITION, PROVIDES EDUCATION TO STUDENTS BY PROVIDING OPPORTUNITIES TO EXPLORE THE VARIOUS SUBJECTS WRITTEN AND ILLUMINATED IN THE BIBLE. CHAMINADE PLANS TO USE THE BIBLE IN LITURGIES MARKING EVENTS OF GREATEST SIGNIFICANCE IN CAMPUS LIFE, SUCH AS GRADUATIONS AND INSTALLATIONS. CHAMINADE WILL ALSO MAKE IT AVAILABLE FOR USE BY THE DIOCESE OF HONOLULU FOR SIMILAR OCCASIONS, SUCH AS THE ANNUAL RED MASS FOR HAWAII'S POLITICAL LEADERS AND THE OPENING OF THE ACADEMIC YEAR MASS WITH THE CATHOLIC SCHOOL TEACHERS.

Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.Identifier: DESCRIPTION OF INTENDED USE OF ENDOWMENT FUNDS:
Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.Explanation: ENDOWMENT FUNDS ARE USED FOR SCHOLARSHIPS AND PROGRAM EXPENSES.

Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.Identifier: DESCRIPTION OF UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS UNDER FIN 48:
Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.Explanation: THE UNIVERSITY HAS EVALUATED ITS TAX POSITIONS AND DETERMINED THAT THERE WERE NO UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS AT JUNE 30, 2011 AND 2010. INTEREST AND PENALTIES, IF ANY (NONE IN 2011 OR 2010), ARE INCLUDED IN INSTITUTIONAL SUPPORT EXPENSES. AS OF JUNE 30, 2011, THE YEARS THAT REMAIN SUBJECT TO EXAMINATION BY TAXING AUTHORITIES ARE 2008 AND THEREAFTER.

Form990ScheduleEPartII.Explanation: "NOTICE OF NONDISCRIMINATORY POLICY" IS AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC VIA THE UNIVERSITY CATALOG, STUDENT HANDBOOK AND CHAMINADE WEBSITE (WWW.CHAMINADE.EDU)

Form990ScheduleIPartIV.Identifier: PROCEDURE FOR MONITORING GRANTS IN THE U.S.:
Form990ScheduleIPartIV.Explanation: SCHEDULE I, PART I, LINE 2: THE SCHOOL PROVIDES GRANTS IN THE FORM OF CREDITS AGAINST TUITION INVOICES. GRANT FUNDS ARE NOT ACTUALLY DISBURSED FROM THE SCHOOL.

NameOfInterestedPerson.NamePerson: BRO ROBERT HOPPE REV MARTIN SOL

Form990ScheduleLPartIV.Relationship: DIRECTORS OF EO AND OFFICERS OF MARIANIST CENTER OF HAWAII
Form990ScheduleLPartIV.DescriptionOfTransaction: EO LEASES LAND AND CERTAIN BUILDINGS FROM MARIANIST CENTER OF HAWAII.

GeneralExplanation.Explanation: FORM 990, PART III, LINE 4A: IN THE CURRENT YEAR, CHAMINADE OFFERED A NEW FOUR-YEAR UNDERGRADUATE PROGRAM LEADING TO THE BACHELOR'S OF SCIENCE DEGREE IN NURSING (BSN). CHAMINADE'S NURSING PROGRAM PROVIDES A CONTEMPORARY CURRICULUM CHARACTERIZED BY SOPHISTICATED SIMULATED PATIENT CARE EXPERIENCES, INFORMATICS, GENOMICS, AND CULTURAL COMPETENCY. THE NURSING PROGRAM IS HOUSED IN THE STATE-OF-THE-ART DR. LAWRENCE K.W. AND MRS. BOHING CHAN TSEU CENTER FOR NURSING EDUCATION. GRADUATES WILL BE DEDICATED RNS PREPARED FOR WORK IN A VARIETY OF HEALTH CARE SETTINGS WITHIN HAWAII, THE PACIFIC REGION AND THE U.S. MAINLAND.
FORM 990, PART V: QUESTIONS 7G AND 7H ARE NOT APPLICABLE TO THE EXEMPT ORGANIZATION. AS SUCH, THEY HAVE BEEN MARKED NO.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: A DRAFT OF THE 990 WILL BE SUBMITTED TO THE AUDIT COMMITTEE AT THEIR APRIL 2012 MEETING FOR REVIEW PRIOR TO FINALIZATION & FILING.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: EACH YEAR, IN JULY/AUGUST, THE PRESIDENT'S OFFICE EMAILS THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST FORMS TO EACH CURRENT MEMBER OF THE BOARD OF REGENTS. FORMS ARE THEN SENT BACK TO THE PRESIDENT'S OFFICE, WHO REVIEWS THE COMPLETED FORMS AND TRACKS WHICH FORMS MAY STILL BE OUTSTANDING.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: FOR THE ORGANIZATION'S PRESIDENT, THE BOARD NEGOTIATES THE CONTRACT IN CONJUNCTION WITH THE UNIVERSITY LEGAL COUNSEL. FOR OTHER OFFICERS OR KEY EMPLOYEES, COMPENSATION IS NEGOTIATED BY THE PRESIDENT OF THE UNIVERSITY WHO CONSULTS WITH THE PERSONNEL OFFICE & COMPARES COMPENSATION WITH PEER INSTITUTIONS.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE ORGANIZATION'S GOVERNING DOCUMENTS & CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY ARE AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST. THE ORGANIZATION'S FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE AVAILABLE ON THE ORGANIZATION'S WEBSITE & UPON REQUEST.

FORM 990, PART X, LINES 27(A)-29(A): UNRESTRICTED, TEMPORARILY RESTRICTED, AND PERMANENTLY RESTRICTED NET ASSETS AS OF JUNE 30, 2009 AND JUNE 30, 2010 WERE RESTATED FROM AMOUNTS PREVIOUSLY REPORTED IN THE AUDITED FINANCIALS TO PROPERLY REFLECT INVESTMENT RETURNS INTO THE PROPER NET ASSET CLASSIFICATION. THE ADJUSTMENT DID NOT AFFECT TOTAL NET ASSETS AS OF JUNE 30, 2009 AND JUNE 30, 2010. AS SUCH, LINES 27(A)-29(A), BEGINNING OF YEAR UNRESTRICTED NET ASSETS, TEMPORARILY RESTRICTED NET ASSETS, AND PERMANENTLY RESTRICTED NET ASSETED, WILL NOT TIE TO THE AUDITED FINANCIALS.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: CHANGES IN NET ASSETS OR FUND BALANCES:
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: NET UNREALIZED GAINS ON INVESTMENTS: 898,439. CHANGE IN NET ASSETS OF CUEF: 186,655. ROUNDING: 1. TOTAL TO FORM 990, PART XI, LINE 5: 1,085,095.
FORM 990, PART XII, LINE 2C: THE OVERSIGHT AND SELECTION PROCESS HAS NOT CHANGED FROM THE PRIOR YEAR.

ON JULY 28, 2010, CERTAIN REAL PROPERTY LOCATED AT 1334 KANEWAI STREET, HONOLULU, HAWAII, 96816, WAS DONATED TO CHAMINADE PURSUANT TO DECEDENT JANICE KAWAI JUN SUE'S LAST WILL AND TESTAMENT. DONATION OF SUCH PROPERTY WAS ACCRUED FOR ON THE JUNE 30, 2010 AUDITED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AS CONTRIBUTION REVENUE, HOWEVER, THE TRANSACTION WAS NOT SETTLED UNTIL THE CURRENT FISCAL YEAR ENDING JUNE 30, 2011. AS SUCH, ALTHOUGH THE CONTRIBUTION WAS REFLECTED ON THE PRIOR YEAR (2009) TAX RETURN IN PART VIII, STATEMENT OF REVENUE, NO DISCLOSURE OF SUCH CONTRIBUTION WAS RECORDED ON SCHEDULES B AND M. INSTEAD SUCH DISCLOSURE WILL BE MADE ON THE CURRENT YEAR (2010) TAX RETURN SCHEDULES B AND M.
